title: Tick Tock Organic Rooibos Tea 80Bag X 1
description: Tick Tock Organic Rooibos Tea 80 Redbush Bags 200g Naturally Caffeine Free High In Antioxidants Low in Tannin Allows Restful Sleep Finest Grade From The Founders Of Rooibos Tea Est. 1903 Over 100 years - Original Rooibos Tea. In 1903 Benjamin Ginsberg, the founder of rooibos tea, rode into the remote Cedarberg mountains in the Cape and found farmers making a rough brew from a wild plant. Using traditional tea curing techniques, he perfected this delicious tea now enjoyed around the world. Today his family continue their unbroken rooibos tea tradition with Tick Tock tea, made to his original specification, enjoyed since 1903. Gentle and soothing, rooibos is well known for its many health properties. Naturally caffeine free Tick Tock can be enjoyed by the whole family at any time of the day, or as the ideal bedtime drink. And it is high in antioxidants that can help protect your immune system against free radicals. Tick Tock rooibos tea is still harvested by hand and cured naturally in the clear Cedarberg air - Prepare and Use: Directions Add freshly boiled water and allow to brew for 2-4 minutes. Add sugar or honey to taste. Delicious with, or without, milk. Also with lemon, or as an iced tea with mint.
